ml.clustering

Class L1NMF

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.clustering.Clustering
      • ml.clustering.L1NMF
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NMF

    public class L1NMF
extends Clustering
    A Java implementation for L1NMF which solves the following optimization problem:

    min || X - G * F ||_F^2 + gamma * ||F||_{sav} + nu * ||G||_{sav}
    s.t. G >= 0, F >= 0

    Version:
    1.0 Jan. 31st, 2014
    Author:
    Mingjie Qian
